PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Immerse yourself in a timeless literary masterpiece.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: An inspiring and captivating true story.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Discover new destinations and local gems.
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch for All Your Book Needs
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether you're a reader or a bookseller, we're here to help.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from book lovers who enjoy our service
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a bookworm's dream! I can easily find and purchase any book I want with just a few taps.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love the convenience of having thousands of books at my fingertips. The app makes buying books a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has helped me discover so many amazing books I wouldn't have found otherwise. The recommendations are on point!
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore our extensive collection of books across countless genres and topics. From bestsellers to hidden gems, we've got something for every reader.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our algorithm learns your reading preferences and suggests books tailored just for you. Discover new favorites with ease.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Browse, purchase, and have books delivered straight to your doorstep with just a few taps. Enjoy a seamless shopping experience.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Connect with fellow bookworms through our virtual book clubs and discussion forums. Share your thoughts and get recommendations from like-minded readers.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Access our collection of ebooks and audiobooks anytime, anywhere. Take your library on the go and read or listen at your convenience.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Stay up to date with our latest promotions and discounts. Score great deals on your favorite books and discover new releases at unbeatable prices.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and popular digital wallets for secure online payments.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Standard shipping times are 5-7 business days. Expedited shipping is available at checkout for faster delivery.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I return or exchange a book?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, we have a hassle-free return policy. You can return most items within 30 days for a full refund.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We regularly run sales and promotions. Sign up for our newsletter to get notified of discounts and special offers.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about purchasing books on our platform
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and mobile wallets for secure online payments.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, we provide free standard shipping on orders over $35 within the continental United States.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I return or exchange a book?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely. You can return most items in new condition within 30 days for a refund or exchange.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How do I track my order?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number to check its status online.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we have a vast selection of e-books available for purchase and download directly to your device.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_CREATE_ACCOUNT_PLACEHO: Join our community of book lovers
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_ALREADY_HAVE_ACCOUNT_P: Already have an account? Log in here
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to start finding your next great read
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Explore our massive collection of books from bestsellers to hidden gems across every genre imaginable.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Shop from the comfort of your home or on-the-go with our user-friendly mobile app.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Take advantage of our daily deals, discounts, and affordable pricing on new and used books.
CTA_BODY: Browse our extensive collection of books spanning various genres. With just a few clicks, you can find your next literary adventure.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Browse our vast collection of books from classics to the latest releases.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Millions of Books at Your Fingertips
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: BookBuyer makes it easy to discover and purchase books from a vast selection. Happy reading!
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Discover your next great read with ease.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Browse, buy, and enjoy books from anywhere.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover your next great read with our vast collection and user-friendly book-buying experience.
